title: PRECEDE-PROCEED Model-Based Training Course for Improving Accuracy of Death Cause Documentation

context.prior_knowledge: Basic medical knowledge and experience in death certificate documentation
context.additional_context: For clinical practitioners requiring enhanced practical competencies in linking medical data quality with public health policy

learning_goals: Learners can create a cause-of-death analysis framework by applying the 9-step process of the PRECEDE-PROCEED model.
Learners can complete death certificates with over 92% accuracy according to the WHO standard cause-of-death classification (ICD-11).
Learners can explain data linkage mechanisms between healthcare institutions and public health systems and propose improvement strategies.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
